lead_paragraph: Gladys Knight says being married to a western North Carolina native has turned her into a country girl at heart, and she's hoping to turn that new affection into possibly the best thing that's ever happened to Canton.

headline.main: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution
